definition: poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with

sentences.english: An edict has been issued temporarily abolishing the land tax in Shantung, as the people are unable to pay it owing to the famine.
sentences.chinese: 饥荒使农民无力纳税，山东已发布法令临时取消田赋。

sentences.english: The land-tax system is one of important items in Xinjiang's taxation during the Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 田赋制度是清代新疆赋税制度的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: In addition, they were forced to pay innumerable surtaxes , to say nothing of the government land tax.
sentences.chinese: 除了田赋以外，他们还被迫交纳多如牛毛的各种杂捐。

sentences.english: The last, appraise the achievement of the land tax reform in 1930s.
sentences.chinese: 最后对30年代田赋整顿的成绩进行评价。

definition: taxation/in former times, esp. land tax
a form of transit taxation in China introduced to finance armies to suppress the Taiping Rebellion
to let sb off (punishment, taxation etc)/to reprieve sb
land tax/money and grain (given as tax or tribute)
